transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Sales/SalesOrderHeader.parquet']) ~> SrcSalesOrderHeader
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Sales/SalesOrderDetail.parquet']) ~> SrcSalesOrderDetail
source(output(
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [ProductAlternateKey],[ProductKey]  FROM [dbo].[DimProduct]',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> SrcDimProduct
source(output(
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		CustomerKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [CustomerAlternateKey],[CustomerKey] FROM [dbo].[DimCustomer]',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> SrcDimCustomer
SrcSalesOrderDetail, MapDrifted1 join(SrcSalesOrderDetail@SalesOrderID == MapDrifted1@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesOrderDetails
SrcSalesOrderHeader derive(SalesOrderID = toInteger(byName('SalesOrderID')),
		RevisionNumber = toInteger(byName('RevisionNumber')),
		OrderDate = toTimestamp(byName('OrderDate')),
		DueDate = toTimestamp(byName('DueDate')),
		ShipDate = toTimestamp(byName('ShipDate')),
		Status = toInteger(byName('Status')),
		OnlineOrderFlag = toBoolean(byName('OnlineOrderFlag')),
		SalesOrderNumber = toString(byName('SalesOrderNumber')),
		PurchaseOrderNumber = toString(byName('PurchaseOrderNumber')),
		AccountNumber = toString(byName('AccountNumber')),
		CustomerID = toInteger(byName('CustomerID')),
		ShipToAddressID = toInteger(byName('ShipToAddressID')),
		BillToAddressID = toInteger(byName('BillToAddressID')),
		ShipMethod = toString(byName('ShipMethod')),
		CreditCardApprovalCode = toString(byName('CreditCardApprovalCode')),
		SubTotal = toDecimal(byName('SubTotal')),
		TaxAmt = toDecimal(byName('TaxAmt')),
		Freight = toDecimal(byName('Freight')),
		TotalDue = toDecimal(byName('TotalDue')),
		Comment = toString(byName('Comment')),
		rowguid = toString(byName('rowguid')),
		ModifiedDate = toTimestamp(byName('ModifiedDate'))) ~> MapDrifted1
JoinSalesOrderDetails, SrcDimProduct join(ProductID == toInteger(ProductAlternateKey),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimProduct
JoinDimProduct, SrcDimCustomer join(CustomerID == toInteger(CustomerAlternateKey),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimCustomer
DrvDateKey select(mapColumn(
		ProductKey,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		OrderQuantity = OrderQty,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		UnitPrice,
		LineTotal,
		rowguid = SrcSalesOrderDetail@rowguid,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate = OrderDateKey,
		CustomerKey,
		DueDate = DueDateKey,
		ShipDate = ShipDateKey,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFactInternetSales
JoinDimCustomer derive(DueDateKey = toString(DueDate, 'YYYMMdd'),
		ShipDateKey = toString(ShipDate, 'YYYYMMdd'),
		OrderDateKey = toString(OrderDate, 'YYYYMMdd')) ~> DrvDateKey
